text: Ani jara tumhi pravasata asala ani lihinara adhalala nahi tara tarana gahana thevuna vyavahara karuna ghya ani jara apasata ekamekanvara visvasa asela tara jyala anamata dili geli ahe, ti tyane ada karavi ani allahace bhaya balaguna rahave, jo tyacya palanakarta ahe. Ani saksa lapavu naka, ani jo saksa lapavila, to manane papi ahe ani tumhi je kahi karata, allaha te cangalya prakare janato
